definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Methods A part of 2002-2003 7-year medical students and tutors were interviewed.
sentences.chinese: 方法召開七年制學生和導師座談會。

sentences.english: The society decided on(upon)a lecture series and appointed a committeeman to determine the dates, etc.
sentences.chinese: 一系列的聯誼活動，座談會，漢語課程和專題講座。

sentences.english: Towards the end of the forum, Zhang Ming to find Professor Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 座談會快結束時，章鳴找到張教授。

sentences.english: Huaibei Mining Vice President Baozi Tian, attended the meeting and delivered speeches.
sentences.chinese: 淮北礦業副總經理鮑子田出席座談會並講話。

sentences.english: It will be held on January 16-17 in Taipei and Hsinchu.
sentences.chinese: 此座談會將於一月十六和十七號在國立臺灣大學舉行。

sentences.english: To look for your ideas from meetings, colloquia , lectures and night courses.
sentences.chinese: 從會議，座談會，講座，及夜間課程中找尋你的主意。

sentences.english: Parent-teacher conferences will be held this Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 家長教師座談會本週六上午十一時舉行。

sentences.english: May 8, 1975, CPC holded a national steel industry forum.
sentences.chinese: 中共召開全國鋼鐵工業座談會。

sentences.english: More than 20 foreign experts and their families attended the discussions.
sentences.chinese: 20多位外國專家及其親屬參加了座談會。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of nurse-patient informal symposium on nursing management.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討工休座談會在醫療護理管理實踐中的作用。

sentences.english: And the symposium is an all-male drinking event.
sentences.chinese: 這種座談會是一種只有男性參加的酒會。

sentences.english: The research will be presented at the Network and Distributed System Security Symposium in early February.
sentences.chinese: 研究將在二月初網絡和分佈式系統安全座談會上發表。

sentences.english: Attend a meeting or convention and talk to people in the organization.
sentences.chinese: 出席一次會議或座談會，並且與組織者談話。

sentences.english: Hello. Welcome to our PFLAG meeting.
After two days, law work committee send up a meeting to research the opinions of conversazione .
sentences.chinese: 過兩天，法工委開會研究座談會提出的意見。

sentences.english: Jia Qinglin, chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference delivered a speech over the talks.
sentences.chinese: 全國政協主席賈慶林出席座談會並講話。

definition: to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
to express in words or writing/to make a speech (esp. short introduction, vote of thanks, afterword, funeral homily etc)/to address (an audience)/same as 致詞|致词
